Impact_Finding: Soil moisture driven by ENSO affects rice yields
Key_Data_Result: Upland rainfed systems highly sensitive; irrigated systems more stable

Impact_Finding: Wet-season rice most affected by stochastic rainfall
Key_Data_Result: Wet season (Q3-Q4) rainfall dominated by tropical cyclone activity

Impact_Finding: Typhoons, floods, droughts as major loss causes
